com.ani.octopus.service.agent.service.websocket

Interface AccountInvoker

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AniInvokable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AniInvokerImpl

    public interface AccountInvoker
    The basic interface for the third party to report the Account's State to the Anicloud Platform. Then, the Anicloud Platform can notify the appointed account and call the stub on the account object.

    Created by zhaoyu on 15-11-14.
